TESTIMONIALS:

Joe E. - I have racked with Hosting and Designs for two decades now. I have found their
services to be both personable and professional and their rates are reasonable. Their support
is available but unobtrusive and their advice when I have asked for it has been accurate and
focused on my needs not on adding unnecessary services. Very good company, excellent
offerings and fit the needs of anyone be they a hobbyist, entrepreneur, technician wanting to
hone skills on server administration or a business [that] wants a turn key web design and
managed server. Their services scale up nicely and I consider them more of a partner than
a purveyor. Facebook.com


Konrad F. - We've had a vps with Hostings and Designs for a few years now and their support
staff have always been extremely responsive whenever we've needed their assistance. Their
prices are fantastic too! Serchen.com


Shanu V. — I have used Hosting and Designs since 2005 and will recommend their service as
second to none, I cannot fault them in any way and their technical support is the best
I have ever experienced. Facebook.com


Mike O. - You provide the best value, hands down, in the discount dedicated server market.
Great price and great support/stability. I’ve worked in the managed hosting industry for
several years so I know the difficulties that the business can present. Needless to say I
am impressed with your service, especially at that price point.
Thanks again, (direct email)


Diane B. - Hosting and Design[s'] officials were very efficient and responsive to our needs.
They offered great suggestions to improve the website. Serchen.com
